nlacp: If either a patient or a personal health officer has not provided a report on satisfaction with a visit to the doctor for a survey, the patient may not use the survey for a visit to the doctor.

truth.subject: patient
truth.condition: either a patient or a personal health officer has not provided a report on satisfaction with a visit to the doctor for a survey
